Class hdpManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • bluetooth.hdpManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    hdpManagerListener, events.EventIEEEListener

    public class hdpManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements hdpManagerListener, events.EventIEEEListener

    • Method Detail

      • startDbusPlatform

        private boolean startDbusPlatform()
        Start dbus platform for message interchanging within processes in Linux OS.
        Returns:
        if the Dbus platform is correctly initialized.

      • getLocalBluetoothAdapterPath

        private java.lang.String getLocalBluetoothAdapterPath()
        Get the path for the local Bluetooth adapter which is in use at the moment.
        Returns:
        local bluetooth adapter path

      • showLocalBluetoothAdaptersPath

        private void showLocalBluetoothAdaptersPath()
        Show path of all local bluetooth adapters available at PC (may be more than one).

      • showDefaultLocalBluetoothAdaptersProperties

        private void showDefaultLocalBluetoothAdaptersProperties()
        Show all properties of the DEFAULT local bluetooth adapter. In case a computer has more than one Bluetooth adapter, there will be one in use by default.

      • getRemoteBluetoothAdapterPath

        private java.lang.String getRemoteBluetoothAdapterPath(java.lang.String macAddressRemoteDevice)
        Get the object path of a remote device given a MAC address (format:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX).
        Parameters:
        macAddressRemoteDevice - the MAC address of the desired remote device (the format of the MAC is XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX).
        Returns:
        the path for the remote Bluetooth device in the local machine.

      • showRemoteBluetoothAdapterProperties

        private void showRemoteBluetoothAdapterProperties(java.lang.String remoteDevicePath)
        Show all properties of a remote device (it should be first created with getRemoteBluetoothAdapterPath method).
        Parameters:
        remoteDevicePath - the path for the remote Bluetooth device in the local machine.
        See Also:
        showDefaultLocalBluetoothAdaptersProperties()

      • setPropertyRemoteDevice

        private void setPropertyRemoteDevice(java.lang.String remoteDevicePath,
                           java.lang.String propertyKey,
                           boolean propertyValue)
        Modify a property of a remote device. This will be used for enabling the "Trusted" property in a remote Health Device Profile capable device for being establish a connection.
        Parameters:
        remoteDevicePath - the path for the remote Bluetooth device in the local machine.
        propertyKey - the name of the property to be modified.
        propertyValue - the new value for the property.

      • createHDPApplication

        private java.lang.String createHDPApplication(java.lang.String dataTypeValue,
                                    java.lang.String roleValue,
                                    java.lang.String shortDescriptionValue,
                                    java.lang.String channelTypeValue)
        Create a new HDP application and gets the object path of the new created application.
        Parameters:
        dataTypeValue - which kind of a HDP capable device will be used.
        roleValue - set the role of the HDP role that the local machine will be playing. Usually, "Sink"
        shortDescriptionValue - custom string for helping the remote devices to identify the local machine they are connected to.
        channelTypeValue - set whether the channel is working with trusted or streaming mode.
        Returns:
        the path of the new Health Device Profile application newly created in the local machine.

      • destroyHDPApplication

        private void destroyHDPApplication(java.lang.String objectPathHDPApplication)
        Destroy an HDP application.
        Parameters:
        objectPathHDPApplication - the path of the Health Device Profile application to be destroyed.

      • getDbusSystemAvailability

        private boolean getDbusSystemAvailability()
        Checks DBUS system availability.
        Returns:
        true if the Dbus system is available, or false if not.

      • enableHDPListener

        private boolean enableHDPListener()
        Add a specific rule to follow HDP messages inside DBUS.
        Returns:
        true if the local application is subscribed to HDP messages in DBus.

      • waitHDPConnections

        private void waitHDPConnections()
        Wait for new incoming HDP connections.

      • getHDPDataChannelPath

        private java.lang.String getHDPDataChannelPath(java.lang.String remoteDevicePath)
        Get the object path of the HDP channel ready to send/receive data to/from Continua devices.
        Parameters:
        remoteDevicePath - the path for the remote Bluetooth device in the local machine.
        Returns:
        the path of the data channel from a Health Device Profile application.

      • showHDPDataChannelProperties

        private void showHDPDataChannelProperties(java.lang.String hdpDataChannelPath)
        Show the properties of a HDP data channel previously created.
        Parameters:
        hdpDataChannelPath - the path of the data channel from a Health Device Profile application.

      • getHDPDataChannelFileDescriptor

        private int getHDPDataChannelFileDescriptor(java.lang.String hdpDataChannelPath)
        Get the file descriptor associated to a HDP data channel
        Parameters:
        hdpDataChannelPath - the path of the data channel from a Health Device Profile application.
        Returns:
        the number that identifies the file descriptor in a Linux OS.

      • releaseHDPDataChannelFileDescriptor

        private void releaseHDPDataChannelFileDescriptor(java.lang.String hdpDataChannelPath)
        Release the file descriptor associated to this HDP data channel (HDP application will be closed).
        Parameters:
        hdpDataChannelPath - the path of the data channel from a Health Device Profile application.

      • waitHDPDataFrames

        private void waitHDPDataFrames(int hdpDataChannelFileDescriptor)
        Wait for HDP data frames from Continua Health devices. These frames will be compliant with ISO/IEEE 11073 standard.
        Parameters:
        hdpDataChannelFileDescriptor - the file descriptor that identifies a HDP data channel.

      • getHDPDataFrame

        private byte[] getHDPDataFrame(int hdpDataChannelFileDescriptor)
        Get the input data frame from a Continua Health device. The data will be retrieved in raw format (byte array), and will be processed by the ISO/IEEE 11073 library included.
        Parameters:
        hdpDataChannelFileDescriptor - the file descriptor that identifies a HDP data channel.
        Returns:
        the data a remote device sent, in raw format.

      • getSizeHDPDataFrame

        private int getSizeHDPDataFrame(int hdpDataChannelFileDescriptor)
        Get the number of bytes read from input data frames.
        Parameters:
        hdpDataChannelFileDescriptor - the file descriptor that identifies a HDP data channel.
        Returns:
        the size of the data frame received.

      • showHDPDataFrame

        private void showHDPDataFrame(int hdpDataChannelFileDescriptor)
        Show HDP data frame received.
        Parameters:
        hdpDataChannelFileDescriptor - the file descriptor that identifies a HDP data channel.

      • sendHDPDataToDevice

        private void sendHDPDataToDevice(int hdpDataChannelFileDescriptor,
                       byte[] hdpDataFrame)
        Send HDP data frames to Continua Health devices after processing the ones previously received and generate the proper response to them.
        Parameters:
        hdpDataChannelFileDescriptor - the file descriptor that identifies a HDP data channel.
        hdpDataFrame - the raw byte array of the data that will be sent back to a Continua device.

      • closeHDPManager

        private void closeHDPManager()
        Free all employed resources and end HDP manager in a well-known status
